author: Jouvet, Denis and Gorin, Arseniy and Vinuesa, Nicolas
title: Exploitation d'une marge de tolérance de classification pour améliorer l'apprentissage de modèles acoustiques de classes en reconnaissance de la parole (Exploitation of a classification tolerance margin for improving the estimation of class-based acoustic models for speech recognition) [in French]
booktitle: Proceedings of the Joint Conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2012, volume 1: JEP
